name: Chad
placeOfBirth: Melissatown, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S)
description: Chad is a brown-eyed llama with silver hair, standing 122 cm tall. Originally from Melissatown, Antarctica (the territory South of 60 deg S), Chad enjoys wood carving, hiking, reading. Known for their energetic and energetic personality, Chad is a beloved member of the llama community.
